commit message: Add padding to the switch layout

Add planned feature to README.md

See: issue #5

Merge pull request #8 from twckr/master

Add German translation

Merge pull request #9 from twckr/master

Correct small error in German translation

Disable screen filter in pause state

This saves battery and allows users to use install prompts in the pause
state. See #6.

Update the notification after the filter is off

The notification used to update immidiately when pressed, but this would
cause bugs when the user immidiately tried to turn it off again. The
user can now only turn it on after it has fully turned off.

Add warning toast and message in notification

The app now displays a toast with a warning that apks won't be able to
be installed while the filter is running, the first time the filter is
started during this session. The notification also displays a warning
while running.

See #6.
